title: Rainy city driving, moderate speed, no significant braking
caption: A red bus drives on a rainy city street, with a blue car following.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.1 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed because the road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars driving in the same direction. The rain is falling heavily, and the visibility is somewhat reduced, so the ego vehicle should maintain a safe distance from other vehicles and be prepared for any potential risks.
